title: Earthquake Safety
description: Learn how to respond during and after earthquakes, including drop-cover-hold techniques.

title: Fire Safety
description: Comprehensive fire prevention, evacuation procedures, and proper use of fire extinguishers.

title: Flood Preparedness
description: Understanding flood risks, evacuation planning, and water safety measures.

title: Cyclone Response
description: Storm preparation, shelter protocols, and post-cyclone safety procedures.

title: Pandemic Preparedness
description: Health protocols, quarantine procedures, and community response strategies.

title: Cyber Safety
description: Protect yourself from cyber threats, phishing, scams, and data breaches.

title: First Aid Basics
description: Emergency medical response including CPR, bleeding control, and shock management.

title: Road Safety
description: Learn safe driving, pedestrian awareness, and accident prevention tips.

title: School Emergency Plans
description: Developing and practicing safety plans for schools and institutions.

title: Community Preparedness
description: How communities can collaborate for disaster risk reduction and recovery.
